commit_message:
perf(lsp): optimize lsp_locator memory allocations

Preallocate the offset_of_lines_ and line_is_ascii_ buffers to reduce
reallocation and copying. This improves performance by 0-33% (9% on
average) in synthetic tests:

    Benchmark                                                             Time             CPU      Time Old      Time New       CPU Old       CPU New
    --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    benchmark_location_scale_of_long_line_mean                         +0.0009         +0.0009         21196         21215         21194         21213
    benchmark_from_position_scale_of_long_line_mean                    +0.0013         +0.0013         12765         12782         12764         12780
    benchmark_location_scale_of_empty_lines_mean                       -0.0708         -0.0708        286679        266389        286653        266360
    benchmark_from_position_scale_of_empty_lines_mean                  -0.3341         -0.3341         35357         23544         35354         23541
    benchmark_range_scale_of_empty_lines_mean                          -0.1100         -0.1100        136507        121495        136494        121482
    benchmark_location_realisticish/1_mean                             -0.0683         -0.0683        174449        162534        174431        162518
    benchmark_location_realisticish/50_mean                            -0.0701         -0.0701        175860        163540        175842        163523
    benchmark_from_position_realisticish/1_mean                        -0.0670         -0.0670        174280        162608        174262        162591
    benchmark_from_position_realisticish/50_mean                       -0.0662         -0.0662        174326        162791        174308        162774
    OVERALL_GEOMEAN                                                    -0.0927         -0.0927             0             0             0             0

    benchmark_location_scale_of_long_line_pvalue                        0.0002          0.0002      U Test, Repetitions: 10 vs 10
    benchmark_from_position_scale_of_long_line_pvalue                   0.0002          0.0002      U Test, Repetitions: 10 vs 10
    benchmark_location_scale_of_empty_lines_pvalue                      0.0002          0.0002      U Test, Repetitions: 10 vs 10
    benchmark_from_position_scale_of_empty_lines_pvalue                 0.0002          0.0002      U Test, Repetitions: 10 vs 10
    benchmark_range_scale_of_empty_lines_pvalue                         0.0002          0.0002      U Test, Repetitions: 10 vs 10
    benchmark_location_realisticish/1_pvalue                            0.0002          0.0002      U Test, Repetitions: 10 vs 10
    benchmark_location_realisticish/50_pvalue                           0.0002          0.0002      U Test, Repetitions: 10 vs 10
    benchmark_from_position_realisticish/1_pvalue                       0.0002          0.0002      U Test, Repetitions: 10 vs 10
    benchmark_from_position_realisticish/50_pvalue                      0.0002          0.0002      U Test, Repetitions: 10 vs 10
